  • Constructor Details

    • Unit_Course

      public Unit_Course(String unitID, int level, double a1, double a2, double exam)
      Parameterized Constructor of Unit_Course class

      This constructor is used to represent and initialize the unit course object.

      Precondition - The value of unit id must be a string, the value of level must be a valid integer value, and the value of a1, a2, and exam must be a valid double value.
      Postcondition - A unit course object is created with the variables set to their parameter values, and enrollment type set to 'C'.
      Parameters:
      unitID - The unit id of unit course object.
      level - The level of unit course object.
      a1 - The assignment 1 mark of unit course object.
      a2 - The assignment 2 mark of unit course object.
      exam - The exam mark of unit course object.

  • Method Details

    • getOverallMarks

      public double getOverallMarks()
      This method is used to retrieve the overall marks of the unit course.

      Precondition - The a1, a2, and exam variables must be initialized.
      Postcondition - Calculates and returns the overall marks of the unit course.

      Parameters:
      Nil - .
      Returns:
      overallMarks The overall marks of the unit course.

    • getFinalGrade

      public String getFinalGrade()
      This method is used to retrieve the student's final grade of the unit course.

      Precondition - getOverallMarks() must return a value.
      Postcondition - Calculates and returns the final grade of the unit based on the overall marks.

      Overrides:
      getFinalGrade in class Unit
      Parameters:
      Nil - .
      Returns:
      finalGrade The final grade of unit course.

    • display

      public void display()
      This method is used to display the unit id, overall marks and the final grade of unit course object.

      Precondition - The variables must be initialized.
      Postcondition - Prints the value of unit id, overall marks and final grade of unit course object.

      Parameters:
      Nil - .
